name: UbTaxi Car Sim
description:
UbTaxi Car Sim is the new best mobile free game to stunt racing while driving fast cars in the streets of the city. Drive the most furious sports cars, drift around the traffic at top speed or stunt jump on the asphalt ramps. Explore the city, and perhaps you will find something interesting.
Game features:
- Fun interactive game with endless replay value.
- Daily bonuses.
- First-person mode.
- Richly detailed car models.
- Many of the components inside the car are interactive.
